author: Ramsey Touchberry
title: $2 Billion Needed For Vote-by-Mail so Voters Don't Have 'Ammunition to Stay Home' Amid Coronavirus, Nancy Pelosi Says
description: "We need at least $2 billion, $4 billion is probably what would really democratize our whole system," the House speaker told reporters.
content:
Democrats are pushing for billions of federal dollars to be included in a fourth economic stimulus package for state elections as the coronavirus pandemic is forcing primaries to be postponed and threatens to impact the November contest.
At least $2 billion … [+5419 chars]
